newsticker-desc: Adds a special page to show a news ticker at the bottom of any desired page.
newsticker-summary: Special page to set the content and pages of the news ticker
newsticker-default-news-help: Set the default news of the news ticker, one per line, wikitext allowed. They be overriden on a per-page basis (see below).
newsticker-default-width-help: Set the default width of the news ticker. It can be overriden on a per-page basis (see below).
newsticker-default-height-help: Set the default heigth of the news ticker. It can be overriden on a per-page basis (see below).
newsticker-pages-help: Set the number of pages that will be showing the news ticker, so that this special page can show one section for each page. Caution: If you reduce the number of pages, the data for the pages left out will be lost!
newsticker-title-help: Set the title of the page were to show the news ticker. Can be any page, existing or not, even special pages.
newsticker-news-help: Set the news for this particular news ticker, overriding the default news.
newsticker-width-help: Set the width for this particular news ticker, overriding the default width.
newsticker-height-help: Set the height for this particular news ticker, overriding the default height.
